roleset.name: expressed with detail, pinpointed

example.name: arg0
example.text: *PRO* To be specific : more guns make possible more gun errors and misuse , more domestic and accidental injuries -LRB- deaths -RRB- in the home , and more reliance on lethal force to solve problems that could be solved other ways .

example.name: both args
example.text: Or perhaps [your advisor]-1 said you needed an editor, but [*-1] wasn't very specific about why, and you need an objective person to tell you the truth.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, connection to 'specify', 'specification'.

roleset.name: particular to, unique to

example.name: both args
example.text: Perhaps your anxiety is specific to magicians

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.
